Description: Available 9/1/23!! 3 bed/2bath condo with private outdoor space. Spacious and open h/w floors, exposed brick & in unit washer/dryer. There is a large liv/dining area with a decorative fireplace, built in bookcase and mini wine fridge. The galley kitchen was updated 2 years ago as well as the master bath. New vanities in both bathrooms. The large master bedroom has a master bath. Property will be freshly painted upon delivery and owners are leaving window AC units. Mini split AC unit in the common areas. Broker fee due from tenant.
